articles.description: Malayalam actor turned director Prithviraj Sukumar'an's Aadujeevitham is in theatres. In this interview he discusses why and how the Malayalm film industry churns out "great content" consistently, and yet, at the same time, doesn't get carried away by success.
articles.content: As other film industries chase tent poles and box office triumph, Malayalam cinema has been delivering one success after another — immersive cinema that redefines genre and human experience, so much … [+4864 chars]
